content.title: TEVAR for Type B Dissection
content.description: Thoracic endovascular aortic repair for Type B aortic dissection

key_concepts.details: Complicated: malperfusion, rupture, uncontrolled pain/hypertension - urgent TEVAR indicated
Medical management first-line; consider preemptive TEVAR for high-risk features
Entry tear >10mm, false lumen >22mm, partial thrombosis, aortic growth
Cover entry tear, promote true lumen expansion and false lumen thrombosis

content.clinical_significance: TEVAR improves remodeling outcomes in uncomplicated TBAD

primary_sources: Nienaber CA et al. N Engl J Med 2013
